name: Prison Run and Gun
description:
Prison Run and Gun is a retro puzzle platformer with modern gameplay and mechanics.

The recent events in a state prison, involving Jake from Team was a perfect moment for some prisoners to escape - you are one of them.
Use your skills and the guns to break through 30 sections standing between you and the freedom !


Prison Run and Gun is a spinoff of our other game - Hot Guns

http://store.steampowered.com/app/376910/Hot_Guns/
